pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flameshot is a screenshot tool that aims to be powerful yet simple-to-use. Its notable features include customizable appearance, in-app screenshot editing, D-Bus interface, tray icon support, experimental GNOME/KDE Wayland support, integration with Imgur and support for both GUI and CLI interface.
Flameshot 是一款功能强大且易于使用的截图工具。其主要功能包括可自定义外观、 应用内截图编辑、D-Bus 接口、系统托盘图标支持、实验性的 GNOME/KDE Wayland 支持、 Imgur 集成以及 GUI 和 CLI 界面支持。
